call_summary.final_outcome: Receptionist completed an intake for a motor vehicle accident and attempted to consult with an attorney; after a hold, the receptionist informed the caller that no insurance coverage was available for the claim and advised the caller to contact the firm again if uninsured motorist coverage is confirmed.

transfer_context.description: Receptionist attempted to transfer the caller to an attorney for a consultation but returned to the line to provide the legal determination directly.
